whatItIs.label: Upstream Care
whatItIs.title: A calm, structured sound practice
whatItIs.sub: Sound Healing uses resonance, rhythm, and guided rest to help the nervous system downshift without performance.
whatItIs.p1: It is simple: you arrive, you settle, sound creates a field, and your body has room to integrate. Nothing to achieve.
whatItIs.p2: The promise is not medical treatment. It is training capacity: downshifting, returning to rhythm, and leaving with more space inside.

whyItWorks.label: Sound and the Nervous System
whyItWorks.title: Why it works
whyItWorks.p1: The human body is 70% water. Sound travels through water.
whyItWorks.p2: The nervous system is immersed in that water.
whyItWorks.p3: When the bowl strikes, vibration meets the fluid, propagates as a wave, and reaches every nerve from within.
whyItWorks.sun_body: The frequency of fire. Heat that dissolves.
whyItWorks.moon_body: Internal water frequency and the subtle body's rhythm.
whyItWorks.ocean_body: Undulation that cleanses and opens energy centers.
whyItWorks.forest_body: Root. Grounding. Low sound that anchors to earth.
